charges.charge_description: KNOWINGLY AND WITH INTENT TO DEFRAUD PRODUCING AND USING ONE OR MORE COUNTERFEIT ACCESS DEVICES, IN VIOLATION OF TITLE 18:1029(a)(1); KNOWINGLY AND WITH INTENT TO DEFRAUD USING ONE OR MORE UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS DEVICES DURING ANY ONE YEAR PERIOD AND BY SUCH CONDUCT OBTAINING $1,000.00 OR MORE IN VALUE, IN VIOLATION OF TITLE 18:1029(a)(2); KNOWINGLY AND WITH INTENT TO DEFRAUD HAVING CUSTODY AND CONTROL OF AND POSSESSING DEVICE-MAKING EQUIPMENT, IN VIOLATION OF TITLE 18:1029(a)(4)
